nodes.bodyText: since only one Instrumentation class, don't need to break out abstract base class

nodes.bodyText: I don't think u need helper class, can call SystemMetrics.registerObservers() directly from here
I'm ok with this approach for now, and we can log an issue to improve this in the future (ideally the agent wouldn't know about the instrumentation), @iNikem @anuraaga?

@trask Do we have any gotchas for using system classloader here? It'd be good to understand well if there are cases we don't support right now.
Following up with the classloader callback approach sounds fine though.
